comment.author: 51035711638@N01
comment._content: According to a NYTimes article, a shift in the wind saved the rest of Brighton Beach from destruction. The article also said the fire didn't interfere with a party to benefit the "Summer Home for Helpless, Crippled Children." Boy, that language wouldn't fly today. The article: query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9B03E1D8153CE633A...

comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...

comment._content: Date for the NYTimes article referred to by yeknod is 6 June, 1912.
